name: wallmount
short_description:
I was looking for a system for showing status on a wall mounted monitor or projector. I did't found any easy to use and still FREE (as in Free Beer!).. 
So I start coding my own in JScript. I'm not super hardcore to jscript - so there is alot of newbie errors... It's hardlinked to our internal servers and some danish news sources. You are welcome to change it to what ever you want..

Milestone.1 is : showing RRD + news + weather
Milestone.2 is : showing RRD + Youtube videos+ news + weather.
Milestone.3 is : PHP-BackEnd interface with Database + showing RRD + Youtube videos+ news + weather.
Milestone.4 is :A nice Linux install (RPM/DEP) for embeded systems(Rasberry pi/Beaglebone)+ showing RRD + Youtube videos+ news + weather.
unRAR the file and point your browser to the index.html file. (change the view to 150% and remove the toolbar and you got a info system!)
The grafs are from our MUNIN-server.
list graf on a CentOS:  
find /var/www/html/munin/ -regex ".*\.\(png\)"
